item.title: How to Grow Cockscomb / Celosia from Seeds
item.dc:creator: Neil Mahaseth
item.description:
Hello, friends in this video we will look at the beautiful cockscomb plant. We will first discuss the cockscomb plant details like type of flowers, color, native place, ideal climate,...

The post How to Grow Cockscomb / Celosia from Seeds appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
Hello, friends in this video we will look at the beautiful cockscomb plant. We will first discuss the cockscomb plant details like type of flowers, color, native place, ideal climate, etc. Then I will show you how I grew the Cockscomb plant from seeds I will share with you more than 2 months’ worth of plant growth updates.

▼Scan @ Video Index▼

  • 00:00 Intro
  • 0:47 Cockscomb Plant Plant Information
  • 2:26 Cockscomb Seed Germination Setup
  • 3:52 Cockscomb Seed Germination and Thinning
  • 5:09 Cockscomb Seedling Transplantation
  • 7:18 Cockscomb Plant Growth Updates
  • 8:17 Mature Cockscomb Plant with Blooms

I hope friends, you liked this video guide on How to Grow Cockscomb / Celosia from Seeds. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it. If you liked this, you might also like our other gardening-related content. Make sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel or join our mailing list to be alerted as soon as a new video is released. Thanks for watching friends see you later bye.

The post How to Grow Cockscomb / Celosia from Seeds appeared first on Plants My Love.
